MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G43 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:22am to carry out safe repair work to faulty equipment on Stoneside Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:27am on 21 November
